alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:44PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison, Clark, Crawford, Perry, Floyd, Meade, Jefferson and Breckinridge Counties through 1215 AM EDT/1115 PM CDT/... At 1143 PM EDT/1043 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Corydon to 13 miles west of Brandenburg. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Louisville around 1200 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
